name: Unicycle Downhill
description:
You've just committed a crime and have to run!

There is only one way to make your way out - a unicycle ride!!
Stay balanced on the unicycle along the downhill road and getaway as far as you can.


Game features :
· Touch left or right side of the screen to adjust the balance of the unicycle.
· Do not panic when you face the various terrains and obstacles, and just stay focus on your balance.
· Be careful not to hurt your arms and legs.
· Protect your head especially.
· Enjoy the speed and physics of your getaway ride!


How far can you run?
